categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: A Sith guard lived on the planet Kesh in 3960 BBY. Following the assassination attempt on Grand Lord Lillia Venn, the guard watched the former High Lord Candra Kitai, who had been made a slave. As Kitai shoveled manure at the zoo, Kitai's daughter Orielle Kitai jumped from the roof of the facility onto the Sith, knocking him unconscious. She then dragged him into a nearby stall and stole his lightsaber.
